entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Fog patches. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
